gpt_critique.critique: Model B overclaims SDG 9 and underweights core land-use law focus; adjust scores to reflect emphasis on sustainable cities, land use governance, and land conservation.

Reduced Inequalities.reason: No direct content addressing inequality in land access; keep minimal impact.

gemini_critique.critique: Model A missed several indirect but significant connections to SDGs related to economic and social equity, and underestimated the direct relevance of land use law to infrastructure and governance.
